title: Mediterranean Quinoa Bowl
instructions: Rinse quinoa and cook in water until fluffy. Let it cool.
In a large bowl, combine quinoa, cucumber, tomatoes, onion, feta, and olives.
Whisk together olive oil and lemon juice, then pour over the salad and toss gently.
Serve chilled.

title: Green Smoothie Power Bowl
instructions: Combine banana, spinach, almond milk, and chia seeds in a blender.
Blend until smooth and creamy.
Pour into a bowl and add your favorite toppings.

title: Overnight Oats with Berries
instructions: Combine oats, almond milk, chia seeds, and maple syrup in a jar.
Stir well, cover, and refrigerate overnight.
In the morning, top with berries and nuts before serving.

title: Spicy Thai Basil Stir-Fry
instructions: In a wok, stir-fry garlic and chilies until fragrant.
Add ground chicken and cook until browned.
Stir in soy sauce and cook for another minute.
Remove from heat and mix in fresh basil leaves until wilted. Serve with rice.

title: Italian Caprese Salad
instructions: Arrange alternating slices of tomatoes and mozzarella on a platter.
Tuck fresh basil leaves in between.
Drizzle with olive oil and balsamic glaze.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.

title: Sri Lankan Rice and Curry
instructions: Cook rice according to package directions.
Prepare at least 3-4 separate curries (e.g., dhal, chicken, beetroot, green beans) using coconut milk and curry spices.
Serve a portion of rice surrounded by small servings of each curry.

title: Sri Lankan Stringhoppers with Coconut Sambol
instructions: Mix rice flour, salt, and hot water to form a soft dough.
Press dough through a stringhopper mould onto stringhopper mats.
Steam for 8–10 minutes until cooked through.
For coconut sambol: mix coconut, onion, chilies, lime juice, and salt.
Serve stringhoppers warm with coconut sambol and curry of choice.

title: Mexican Black Bean Tacos
instructions: Warm black beans in a skillet with cumin and chili powder.
Lightly mash some beans for a creamier texture.
Warm tortillas and fill them with the bean mixture.
Top with fresh avocado, cilantro, and a squeeze of lime.

title: Mediterranean Chickpea Stew
instructions: In a large pot, sauté onion and garlic until fragrant.
Add chickpeas, tomatoes, broth, and spices.
Simmer for 20 minutes until flavors develop.
Stir in spinach/kale until wilted.
Serve warm with crusty bread.

title: Chocolate Avocado Mousse
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a blender or food processor.
Blend until completely smooth and creamy.
Chill for at least 30 minutes before serving.

title: Berry Chia Pudding
instructions: In a bowl, mix chia seeds, almond milk, maple syrup, and vanilla.
Stir well and refrigerate for at least 2 hours (or overnight) until thickened.
Top with fresh mixed berries before serving.

title: Greek Yogurt Parfait
instructions: Layer Greek yogurt in a glass or bowl.
Add granola and fresh berries on top.
Drizzle with honey before serving.
